appName: Desert Ambush VR: Hold the Line!
displayName: Desert Ambush VR: Hold the Line!
display_name: Desert Ambush VR: Hold the Line!
display_long_description:
⚔️ Defend the Princess. Lead the Army. Conquer the Desert in Brutal VR Combat!

Step into the battlefield as the Prince of Wallachia, sworn to protect an Ottoman princess against a relentless enemy horde. Inspired by fan-favorite VR games like Blade & Sorcery and Swordsman VR, Desert Ambush VR delivers brutal, physics-based melee combat where your skill with swords, shields, and flintlocks decides your fate.

🛡️ Story Mode – 10-Battle Campaign
Rally your warriors through 10 intense battles across ancient ruins, rocky canyons, and war-torn desert forts. Trigger traps, collapse structures, and dominate your enemies in the climactic boss showdown.

🔥 Score Mode – Endless Wave Survival
Test your endurance against infinite waves of foes. Choose your difficulty, unlock reinforcements and weapons mid-battle, and fight your way to the top of the global leaderboards.

🎮 Game Features

🗡️ Brutal VR Combat – Fight using swords, war hammers, shields, polearms, flintlock pistols, and throwing bombs in intense close-quarters battles.

🏛️ Destructible Environments – Crush enemies under collapsing columns, trigger rockslides, or weaponize debris and barrels.

🔥 Realistic Physics-Based Fights – Every weapon and object behaves as it should. Slash, bash, and smash your way through waves of attackers.

🎯 Tactical Resource System – Summon allies, heal, or unlock powerful gear during battle.

🏹 Inspired by Blade & Sorcery and Swordsman VR – Ideal for fans of VR sword fighting and physics-driven melee combat.
